sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Col, Row, Form, FormGroup, Label, Button, ModalBody, ModalFooter } from "reactstrap";
// import { connect } from "react-redux";
// import { addContact } from "../../redux";



const AddContact = ({ id, dispatch }) => {
    let firstname, lastname, username, password, position, active;

    return (
        <React.Fragment>
            <Form
                onSubmit={e => {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    if (!firstname.value.trim() || !username.value.trim() || !password.value.trim()) {
                        return;
                    }
                    dispatch(
                        addContact(
                            id,
                            firstname.value,
                            lastname.value,
                            username.value,
                            password.value,
                            position.value,
                            active.value
                        )
                    );
                    firstname.value = "";
                    lastname.value = "";
                    username.value = "";
                    password.value = "";
                    position.value = "";
                    active.value = "";
                }}
            >
                <ModalBody>
                    <Row>
                        <Col md={6}>
                            <FormGroup>
                                <Label for="firstName">First Name</Label>
                                <input
                                    className="form-control"
                                    type="text"
                                    name="firstname"
                                    id="firstName"
                                    ref={node => (firstname = node)}
                                    required
                                />
                            </FormGroup>
                        </Col>
                        <Col md={6}>
                            <FormGroup>
                                <Label for="lastName">Last Name</Label>
                                <input
                                    className="form-control"
                                    type="text"
                                    name="lastname"
                                    id="lastName"
                                    ref={node => (lastname = node)}
                                />
                            </FormGroup>
                        </Col>
                    </Row>
                    <Row>
                        <Col md={6}>
                            <FormGroup>
                                <Label for="username">User Name</Label>
                                <input
                                    className="form-control"
                                    type="text"
                                    name="username"
                                    id="username"
                                    ref={node => (username = node)}
                                />
                            </FormGroup>
                        </Col>
                        <Col md={6}>
                            <FormGroup>
                                <Label for="password">Password</Label>
                                <input
                                    className="form-control"
                                    type="password"
                                    name="password"
                                    id="password"
                                    ref={node => (password = node)}
                                />
                            </FormGroup>
                        </Col>
                    </Row>
                    <Row>
                        <Col md={6}>
                            <FormGroup>
                                <Label for="position">Position</Label>
                                <input
                                    className="form-control"
                                    type="select"
                                    name="position"
                                    id="position"
                                    ref={node => (position = node)}
                                    required
                                />
                            </FormGroup>
                        </Col>
                        <Col md={6}>
                            <FormGroup>
                                <Label for="active">Active</Label>
                                <input
                                    className="form-control"
                                    type="select"
                                    name="active"
                                    id="active"
                                    ref={node => (active = node)}
                                    required
                                />
                            </FormGroup>
                        </Col>
                    </Row>

                </ModalBody>
                <ModalFooter>
                    <Button color="primary" type="submit">
                        Add Contact
                    </Button>
                </ModalFooter>
            </Form>
        </React.Fragment>
    );
};

export default AddContact;
